description: Qin Wansha completed countless tasks to return to reality but finally ended up being absorbed by the Lord God. After waking up again, Qin Wansha no longer expected to leave the space of the Lord God. Hiding, destroying the mainline of the world, and taking the energy of that world as her own. She will let the Lord God know what a terrible thing will happen if she is not wiped out. Wait, who are you? Why do you always appear by my side? Do we know each other?>
